Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory159.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: 'At this trade fair, eight pieces of merchandise will be put on display.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'After that, they will go through four rounds of inspection. The best one selected from them will be accepted by the Lady Qu.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "What I have prepared will blow everyone's socks off! Just watch!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Just wait and see.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "...I feel like the plan doesn't quite align with the objective.", 4: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory158.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Drawn-Out Voice', 3: 'Now to present the merchandise number sevenâ€”', 4: '1'}
{2: "I think it's your showtime now.", 3: '15', 4: 'Lucia', 5: '15'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Do I really have to... go about this mission dressed like this?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Are you nervous, Lucia?', 3: '20', 4: "If you don't feel comfortable doing this, Lucia...", 5: '26'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "No... It's just... I feel a little, weird about it...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Lucia, you look great in this outfit!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I don't... think so...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Lucia, you look great in this outfit!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'I agree.', 3: '28', 4: 'It fits you perfectly, Lucia.', 5: '28'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I'm doing this for the mission, to reach Qu. I shouldn't...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Anyway... I'll be getting on stage.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory160.png'}
{1: 'AniZhuanchangBegin'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'That woman who briefly appeared behind the curtain... was that Qu?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: "Yes, that was her, KCC's leader... At every trade fair, she's kept isolated on a high platform and no one is allowed to go near her.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'You mean like imprisoned?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Huaxu has been forcing Qu to find a vessel for him on this ship...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'But just like you, she has no choice but to obey Huaxu, right?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Right. The Kowloong Crew has power, but we can't use it against Huaxu. Hell, some of us even got comfortable living like this.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'And will they stand in the way of our mission?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'As far as I can tell, Chaofeng, Fuxi, and I are the last holdouts who are still trying to rescue the leader and set ourselves free.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'The rest of the Kowloong Crew are ambiguous in their stance. And I suspect that some of them have already had their minds transferred...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'The only one to watch out for is Yazi.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "She's been guarding the leader.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'As the conversation continues, Lucia walks up the stage as instructed. The mechanical puppets around her snap into action.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Lucia, here to present you with a dance of blades.', 4: '1'}
